traceability.evidence: 1) bin/dry-aged-deps.js parses and validates --prod-min-age, --dev-min-age, --prod-severity and --dev-severity flags (see lines ~430–510). 2) print-outdated.js adds a “Type” column in table output and XML for each row. 3) test/printOutdated.prodDependency.test.js verifies ‘prod’ vs ‘dev’ detection in table output. 4) test/cli.flags.test.js covers fallback of --min-age/--severity to both prod/dev. 5) test/cli.config-file.test.js verifies config.prod/dev objects override general settings. 6) Manual run: `node bin/dry-aged-deps.js --format=json --prod-min-age=15` yields `"thresholds": { "prod": { "minAge": 15, ... }, "dev": { "minAge": 7, ... } }`.
